entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then a few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
